tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
From the moment I started my treatment with Dr. Anashwar and his team at Dent√©, I knew I was in good hands. The clinic is not only top-notch and equipped with the latest in dental technology, but it also has a welcoming atmosphere that made me feel comfortable right from the start. 

Dr. Anashwar has a way of making complex procedures seem simple. He took the time to explain each step of my treatment plan, ensuring I understood and was comfortable with what was coming next. His approach is very personalized, and he always considered my concerns and preferences.

The staff at the clinic are a reflection of Dr. Anashwar‚Äôs commitment to excellent patient care. They are kind, attentive, and always went the extra mile to accommodate my schedule and address any anxieties I had about the treatment.

Seeing the results now, I couldn‚Äôt be happier. My smile has transformed, and so has my confidence. Choosing Dr. Anashwar was one of the best decisions I‚Äôve made for my dental health.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Anashwar to anyone looking to improve their smile. His expertise, combined with his genuine care for his patients, truly sets him apart!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
context: Dental Crowns,Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I went to Dr. Anashwar Bhalla for an emergency treatment, where root canal treatment done elsewhere developed an infection and had to be cleaned and corrected. Thanks to that visit some other issues of cavity, decay under old crown were discovered and treated in time. He is very thorough, pays attention to detail and is not in a hurry to finish.
I would definetly recommend him to my family and friends. The entire staff is gentle and cultured, hardly any waiting time as it is managed well. Also safe during covid, very spacious clinic, well ventilated. Parking is easy to find.
Finally, with all the treatment done, I am able to eat normally from both sides after a long long time!
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. Really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience and I look forward to seeing you again in the future. Keep smiling! Regards, Dr. Anashwar Bhalla

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very bad experienceI went for cavity filling and scaling(tooth cleaning). Even after several days, teeth pain is still there and after Cleaning the sensitivity of my tooth has increased. ** ** ******* ** *** **** ******** ******* ***** ********* Treatment is expensive ** **** ** ***********
reply_text:
We are sorry that you were unhappy with your experience. 
1. The treatment costs were clearly given to you in writing before commencement of the procedure and no procedure is undertaken without your consent. All materials used at dente are imported, and hence cost more than local variants used elsewhere.
2. Our front desk had reached out to you the very next after your procedure  and it was conveyed by you that you were not facing any discomfort.
3. Tooth sensitivity is very common after the scaling procedure with subsides within a few days. You were informed about your receding gums during the treatment. 
Please feel free to reach out in case if I could be of any assistance to you.
Warm regards,
Team Dente
